sentence: …Speaker, we are all grateful that the Republican shutdown is  finally over, but millions of Americans are still on the cusp of losing  healthcare. I am talking about SNAP. SNAP provides children and families in my  district and across this country with the help they need to put food on  the table. It reduces food insecurity, and it boosts our local  economies. Our communities can't afford cuts to these benefits.
